titleInfo.title: Existence of financial equilibria in continuous time with potentially complete markets

mods.abstract: We prove that in smooth Markovian continuous{time economies with potentially complete asset markets, Radner equilibria with endoge- nously complete markets exist.

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Riedel, Frank, and Herzberg, Frederik. 2010. Existence of financial equilibria in continuous time with potentially complete markets. Vol. 443. Working Papers. Institute of Mathematical Economics. Bielefeld: Center for Mathematical Economics.
